parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From pros and dechomai; to admit (figuratively) endurance); by implication, to await.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Preposition
str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Noun - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Adverb
str2: Worthily, in a manner worthy of. Adverb from axios; appropriately.

parse: Adjective - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Or prolonged paristano from para and histemi; to stand beside, i.e. to exhibit, proffer, recommend, substantiate; or to be at hand, aid.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Preposition
str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To need, have need of, want, desire. From chreia; to make necessity, i.e. Be in want of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Conjunction
str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.

parse: Noun - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: A female guardian, protector, patroness. Feminine of a derivative of proistemi; a patroness, i.e. Assistant.

parse: Adjective - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: Much, many; often.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
